Retirement village donates emergency water tank to Whatututu https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/06/retirement-village-donates-emergency-water-tank-to-whatututu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/06/retirement-village-donates-emergency-water-tank-to-whatututu/ Wynsley WrigleyCyclone Gabrielle: Water tanks gifted to Te Karaka and Whatututu.Mon, 05 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Kiri Te Kanawa Retirement Village services manager Sam Leahy (left), leader of maintenance Rob Carter and sales adviser Jane Smith stand by as their emergency water tank, installed after Cyclone Gabrielle, is taken away to support the evacuation site and civil defence hub at Whatututu.
